factionKeywords: legiones daemonicalegiones daemonicalegiones daemonicalegiones daemonicalegiones daemonica
lore: Blessed with apotheosis from mortal to daemonic form, a Daemon Prince is a monstrous entity well used to commanding cruel legions in battle. Their supernatural gifts are many and varied, from sorcerous powers to diseased fortitude, warp-forged weaponry, unholy swiftness or burning inner furnaces of unquenchable rage.

otherAbilities.name: Prince of Darkness (Aura)
otherAbilities.description: While a friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit is within 6'' of this model, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.

otherAbilities.name: Unholy Vigour
otherAbilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 3+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Khorne
abilities.description: If this model has the KHORNE keyword, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of this model’s hellforged weapons.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch
abilities.description: If this model has the TZEENTCH keyword, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s infernal cannon.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Nurgle
abilities.description: If this model has the NURGLE keyword, add 1 to this model’s Toughness characteristic.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
abilities.description: If this model has the SLAANESH keyword, add 2'' to this model’s Move characteristic.
